text: 20:25 Godɨn Araziba 27:5-7; Josua 8:31Ia ofa gamir dagɨar dakozimɨn ingar, egh dagɨar gumaziba dɨghoreziba inian markɨ. Guizbangɨra, ia ofa gamir dakozimɨn ingarsɨ, dagɨar tuizimɨn dagɨar ekiatam amɨneghtɨ, arazir kamɨn dagɨar kam nan damazimɨn zueghan koghtɨ, nan ingangarim bar deraghan kogham.
